explains: adv. 古怪地；奇妙地；单数地

sentences.en: He said no and seemed oddly reluctant to talk about it.
sentences.cn: 他说了不，而且很奇怪他似乎不愿谈论这件事。

sentences.en: Oddly, Emma says she never considered her face to be attractive.
sentences.cn: 奇怪，埃玛说她从来都不认为她的脸蛋吸引人。

sentences.en: The novel itself remains oddly inert.
